data.author: Netology. University of Internet Professions of the Future
data.content: Hello, this is the new Netology! Once upon a time, Netology began with intensive courses in online marketing. Then came courses in design, development, analytics and management. We grow ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals. But the most important thing remains with us: we believe that everyone already has the strength that makes them want more, aim higher, run faster. Our mission is to help you get on the path to growth and start a chain of changeâ†’ http://netolo.gy/fyb
